name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: POV: Y/N Replacer for Wattpad and AO3

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically replace y/n and other abbreviations in Wattpad and AO3.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
POV improves the Wattpad and AO3 reading experience by automatically replacing abbreviations like "y/n" with your real name. Immerse yourself in "reader x anything" stories by embedding your real name and attributes in the story!

POV is a prettier, faster, and more advanced InteractiveFics replacement for Wattpad and AO3. Unlike InteractiveFics, POV supports y/n and any other abbreviation, such as e/c, h/c, and c/n. You can also replace arbitrary words like "Charlie" with "Harry".

This extension is not affiliated with the Wattpad company or Archive of Our Own in any way.
